description:
Fragments IV
frag•ment [ n. (frăg′mənt) ]
a part broken off or detached
an isolated, unfinished, or incomplete part
an odd piece, bit, or scrap.
Kelly Wells and Alexa Lynn are put through what seems to them a bondage gauntlet from hell.
A severe head harness designed for punishment and sensory deprivation brings one of the girls under complete control as she is ordered to shave, blind.
Bizarre torment and a humiliating position, combined with unforgiving steel neck, wrist and ankle restraints, serve to heighten the suffering of the other almost to her breaking point.
Over their heads, they struggle to helplessly endure as they intensely feel every exquisite minute of their ordeal.For a sadist, their suffering and discomfort is a beautiful sight to behold.
title: Fragments IV
